title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 41.8 - Exempt products
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 41.8 - Exempt products

State Regulations

Certain products offered as a mortgage loan by an
instrumentality of the United States or of any state shall be exempt from this

Part such as loan products offered by the SONYMA. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
41.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
